product_name: Roxy Syncro 1mm Cap-Sleeve Short Jane Wetsuit - Women's
long_description: Constructed with high-cut arms and legs that are both functional and flattering, this 1mm-thick wetsuit from Roxy fends off chills in warm water temperatures while surfing or stand-up paddleboarding.
short_description: Constructed with high-cut arms and legs that are both functional and flattering, this 1mm-thick wetsuit from Roxy fends off chills in warm water temperatures while surfing or stand-up paddleboarding.
